answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Margie, 
Thank you for your question on negotiations. Unfortunately we do not have any documents specifically on firefighter negotiations ground rules but we do have a document "Have You Planned for a Strike?" This document is mainly about negotiating and strike prevention and may be useful to you in generalities. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/6013
If anyone had any more specific documents please post them in the comments and add them to the Knowledge Network! 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Margie Rose
text:
Hello, I am an intern working for Margie Rose. 
Do any cities out there have the ground rules that were set prior to negotiating with their city's firefighter association? If you could direct me to these rules on your city's website or just enter them into your response, I would greatly appreciate it.
title: Firefighter negotiations ground rules
